price: ߊ߲ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߟߊ߫ ( ߞߐ߲߬ߞߐ߲߬ߒߡߊ ) ߞߎߡߊ ߜߋ߲ߜߋ߲ߦߊߣߍ߲߫ ߒ߬ ߡߊ߬ ߏ߬ ߟߋ ߘߐ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߒ߬ ߧߋ߫ ߡߊ߬ߜߙߏ߬ߟߌ ߞߍ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߞߏߌ߫
arabic: فَحَقَّ عَلَيۡنَا قَوۡلُ رَبِّنَآۖ إِنَّا لَذَآئِقُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: faḥaqqa ʿalaynā qawlu rabbinā innā ladhāiqūna
